name: Cassiopeia (Lowcase)
description:
The game is inspired by Asteroids (the battle mechanics) and Vigor (overall game mechanics).

You are a pilot of a massive space mothership. Everything is automated – you are the only crew member. The mothership contains a research facility for new technologies and also a factory capable of producing small remotely controlled fighters and attaching different weapons and improvements to them. You control the fighter to gather resources from the battle zone. In case the fighter is destroyed, it loses all equipment and resources currently carried. Once it returns to the mothership, you can use the gathered resources to research new technologies and build new equipment.
